import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { EmpserviceService } from '../empformpage/empservice.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-empformview', templateUrl: './empformview.component.html', styleUrls: ['./empformview.component.scss'] }) export class EmpformviewComponent implements OnInit { alldatares!: object; constructor(private emp: EmpserviceService) { } temp :any; tempaddr =[]=[]; alldata() { // let name = []; // let address = []; this.emp.getalldata().subscribe((response) => { for (let i = 0; i < response.response.length; i++) { // console.log(response.response) this.temp = response.response } }) } ngOnInit(): void { this.alldata(); } }
